question: What are the characteristics of the "Universal Proteomics Standard 2" (UPS2)?
ideal_answer: The UPS2 proteomic dynamic range standard was introduced by the Association of Biomolecular Resource Facilities Proteomics Standards Research Group in 2006 and it has a dynamic range of 5 orders of magnitude.

snippets.text: the UPS2 proteomic dynamic range standard introduced by The Association of Biomolecular Resource Facilities Proteomics Standards Research Group in 2006)
Universal Proteomics Standard sample with a dynamic range of 5 orders of magnitude (UPS2).
